question: On Friday, Olivia wants to exercise for thrice the amount of time he did on Thursday and Wednesday combined. On Wednesday he exercised for 38 minutes. On Thursday he exercised for 14 minutes. How many minutes does he have to exercise on Friday to reach his goal?
answer:
On Wednesday and Thursday he exercised a total of 52 minutes because 38 + 14 = <<38+14=52>>52
On Friday he has to exercise for 156 minutes because 52*3 = <<52*3=156>>156
#### 156
